product_name: GoPro The Frame Housing Mount - HERO 3+
long_description: The Frame Housing Mount for HERO 3+ from GoPro is a small, light and low-profile way to mount your GoPro camera. Its open design delivers optimal access and audio capture during low-speed activities. Enjoy easy access to the camera's microSD, Micro HDMI and USB ports for easy data offload, live-feed video and charging. Extendable support arm lets you attach an LCD Touch BacPac or Battery BacPac (both sold separately) and holds the BacPac securely in place while shooting. Integrated latch makes removing your GoPro from The Frame quick and easy. GoPro The Frame Housing Mount includes a protective glass lens to help guard your camera lens from scratches, dirt and debris.
short_description: The Frame Housing Mount for HERO 3+ from GoPro is a small, light and low-profile way to mount your GoPro camera. Its open design delivers optimal access and audio capture during low-speed activities.
